name: ext-time-rs
description: Time utilities: durations, RFC 3339, and time zones.
docs:
Time utilities: durations, RFC 3339, and time zones.

Modules:
- ext.time.duration
- ext.time.rfc3339
- ext.time.civil
- ext.time.instant
- ext.time.tzdb
- ext.time.os
- ext.time.rfc3339.tests
- ext.time.duration.tests

Usage:
- Add dependency: x07 pkg add ext-time-rs@0.1.3
- Import the modules listed above.
